column4: Hey QUEST_TYPEQUEST_AMOUNTQUEST_OBJECT for me. I'll transfer you $QUEST_REWARD!
Aight sure. Better have my money ready when I'm done.
Ay yo I knew I could count on you bro.
Sheesh great job! Here's your money.
Thanks. U a bro for sure.
You're almost halfway there! Keep it up!
Your duty in Los Santos is to become the most respected homie on the block.
You can earn RESPECT and CASH by completing quests or killing enemies.
Use the CASH you earned to buy new weapons and upgrade your stats.
Have fun and remember RESPECT is EVERYTHING!
